page.title: 16Hedge Survey
page.content: Class 5 went to a lane near Keynsham Hospital,on the way to Chewton Keyns -ham to look at the hedge.We had to study 30 metres of hedge to date it. The map reference number is{0365 0167 and the contour reading is 40m.This lane is an old roadway between the villages of Chewton Keynsham,Compton Dando and Keynsham.These are the shrubs we found:hawthorn,blackthorn, alder buckthorn,wild rose,dogwood, elder.Six shrub species means that the hedge is 6 hundred years old.These are all the species in the hedge: meadow barley,goose grass,brome,couch grass,meadow grass,cocksfoot grass,rye grass,ground ivy,stinging nettle,white -dead nettle,blackberry bramble,vetch, mallow,hawksbeard,fern,bird's eye, dandelion,tansy,wild carrot,cuckoo- pint,dogweed,hogweed,dock,ivy.
